survey_name: Adoption of AI-Powered Fitness Coaching Apps Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand user experiences and preferences regarding AI-powered fitness coaching applications, including satisfaction levels, feature preferences, and barriers to adoption.

questions.question_text: How often do you currently use an AI-powered fitness coaching app?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure the options cover all possible usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you currently use an AI-powered fitness coaching app?

questions.question_text: What features do you value most in an AI-powered fitness coaching app? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Appears only to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Randomize the order of options to minimize bias.

script.question_text: What features do you value most in an AI-powered fitness coaching app? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: Appears only to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you do not use an AI-powered fitness coaching app?
questions.routing_logic: Appears only to respondents who selected 'Rarely' or 'Never' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option if needed.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you do not use an AI-powered fitness coaching app?
script.routing_logic: Appears only to respondents who selected 'Rarely' or 'Never' in Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of feedback provided by your AI-powered fitness coaching app?
